text_raw:
2. The Health Act 1947 (Section 31A – Temporary Restrictions) (Covid-

19) (No. 4) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 326 of 2020) are amended - 

(a) 

(b) 

in Regulation 2, by the substitution of “the 16th day of 
September 2020” for “the 14th day of September 2020”, and 

in Regulation 10(1), by the substitution of “paragraph (3)” for

GIVEN under my Official Seal,

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 15th September, 2020.

title: Interest) Act 2020 (No. 1 of 2020)) of the Health Act 1947 (No. 28 of 1947)
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Health Act 1947 (Section 31A - Temporary 
Restrictions) (Covid-19) (No.4) Regulations 2020 (S.I. No. 326 of 2020) to 
provide that the Regulations shall remain in operation until 16 September 2020 
and to correct a reference error.
